bodyText:
Welcome to our game!

To get started, move your controllers in the direction where you'd like to explore.

To collect an item, approach it and click the trigger.

Have fun!

If you are having trouble figuring out the next step in your adventure, you can visit these kiosks or approach an avatar with a light blue shirt.

If you are still having difficulties, how about some frosty delicious documentation?
To win the game, you need to hunt and kill the Wumpus. I feel a draft....
